about_the_game:
Space Engineers Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3 includes Warworn Armor Skin, Cab Cockpit, Twin-blade Wind Turbine, Colorable Solar Panels, Holo LCD, Inset LCD panel, Sloped LCD panel, Curved LCD panel, Round Beacon, Inset Couch, Inset Bed, Inset Button Panel, Entertainment Corner, Inset Bookshelf, Inset Aquarium, Inset Kitchen, Inset Cryo Room, Corner Medical Room, Half Bed, Half Bed Open, Scaffold set, Crates & Barrels and Explosive Barrel.

This content is not “pay to win” and the owner of the package has no advantage against other players. If you decide not to purchase the Decorative Pack #3, but you want to play with friends or other players who did buy Decorative Pack #3, you will still be able to join a multiplayer game or server with them and participate.

Warworn Armor Skin

Make your ship into a weathered veteran - burned, bruised, but not beaten!

Cab Cockpit

A small grid boxy cockpit - ideal for that working truck cab look.

Twin-blade Wind Turbine

Elegant twin-blade variant of wind turbines.

Colorable Solar Panels

  • Colorable Solar Panel - S + L grid
  • Colorable Solar Panel Slope Left - S + L grid
  • Colorable Solar Panel Slope Right - S + L grid
Solar panels with different shapes and possibility to change the color.

Holo LCD

Futuristic hologram variant of LCD screen.

Inset LCD panel

Inset variant of LCD screen.

Sloped LCD panel

Sloped variant of LCD screen.

Curved LCD panel

Curved variant of LCD screen.

Round Beacon

Round variant for the Beacon block.

Inset Couch

An inset couch for decorating interiors. Can be used as a seat.

Inset Bed

An inset bed for decorating interiors. Can preserve the players' inventory and toolbar while they're offline and keeps them alive as long as there is oxygen available in the environment.

Inset Button Panel

Inset block variant for maintaining access to your systems.

Entertainment Corner

Chill out in style and comfort - Entertainment Corner is a decorative block with many uses.

Inset Bookshelf

Decorative block for all the space bookworms.

Inset Aquarium

Aquarium? In space? Yes, that’s right! Just sit down and enjoy the calm view.

Inset Kitchen

Decorative block with the kitchen theme.

Inset Cryo Room

Flush and air tight cryo room. Sweet dreams!

Corner Medical Room

Medical room block variant.

Half Bed, Half Bed Open

A half block sized bed - comfortable, inviting but practical.

Scaffold set

  • Scaffold Block - S + L grid
  • Scaffold Block Slope - S + L grid
  • Scaffold Block Corner - S + L grid
  • Half Scaffold Block - S + L grid
  • Walkable Scaffold Block - L grid
  • Walkable Scaffold Block Corner - L grid
  • Walkable Scaffold Block Corner Inv. - L grid
  • Walkable Half Scaffold Block - L grid
  • Scaffold Block Ladder - L grid
Scaffold Blocks can provide lightweight structural support to ships and stations.

Crates & Barrels

  • Barrel - S + L grid
  • Three Barrels - L grid
  • Stacked Barrels - L grid
  • Cargo Crate - L grid
Crates left scattered around, indicating hard working engineers have been working in the area.

Explosive Barrel

A barrel which has been converted into an improvised explosive. Boom!

This content is not “pay to win” and the owner of the package has no advantage against other players. legal_notice: Space Engineers® and VRAGE™ are trademarks of Keen Software House.
name: Space Engineers - Decorative Pack #3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 3.0 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 750/Radeon R9 270X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
  • Additional Notes: No internet connection needed for single player, but for multiplayer we recommend 5Mbit/s or more
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (latest SP) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 @ 4.5 GHz or higher (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070 GTX / Radeon RX Vega 56 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
  • Additional Notes: No internet connection needed for single player, but for multiplayer we recommend 5Mbit/s or more

pegi.descriptors: The game was rated PEGI 12 for occasional non-realistic violence. Not appropriate for persons below 12 years of age.

short_description: Space Engineers Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3 includes Warworn Armor Skin, Cab Cockpit, Twin-blade Wind Turbine, Colorable Solar Panels, Holo LCD, Inset LCD panel, Sloped LCD panel, Curved LCD panel, Round Beacon, Inset Couch, Inset Bed, Inset Button Panel, Entertainment Corner and many more.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Polish, French, Italian, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
